author: mseidel42
body:
Provides jet flavour algorithms developed by theorists:
* [SDF (soft drop flavour)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.01109)
* [GHS (flavour dressing)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2208.11138)
* [IFN (interleaved flavour neutralisation)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.07314)
* [CMP (flavour-kt)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.11879)
title: fastjet-contrib 1.101
